trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of change occurring in a collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> 物件的集合中發生的變更類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType> enumeration indicates that an element has been added or removed from a managed collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType>列舉型別指示項目已加入或從受管理的集合中移除<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>物件。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class, which is associated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉型別用於<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>類別相關聯<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> class is a collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects, it does not directly raise events.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>類別是集合<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>物件，不直接引發事件。

trans-unit.source: One or more <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> objects have been added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> 物件已加入集合。

trans-unit.source: One or more <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> objects have been removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> 物件已從集合中移除。
